verbs.description: [ARG0: army] [V: testing] [ARG1: new malaria drug for deployed troops] a new drug developed by the walter reed army institute of research called tafenoquine has the potential to eradicate malaria it recently received approval from the food and drug administration apple malaria food and drug administration armys medical materiel development activity maj victor zottig tafenoquine eric white maj victor zottig army tom temin walter reed army institute of research french army product manager army medical materiel development activity
